resources.string: 固件升级要求继续使用B5, 你必须更新现有固件版本

nRF 工具箱是在一个位置储存Nordic半导体应用的集合应用

时间间隔需在10分钟以上!

长按标签可编辑或删除
点击下方账号直接登录
确定从现在开始记录数据吗？
"%1$s需要使用一或多项 Google Play 服务，但这些服务目前不可用。请与开发者联系以寻求帮助。"

版权,深圳市一米阳光科技有限公司\n 版权所有
Uploading of the application has been canceled.

The Device Firmware Update (DFU) app allows you to update the firmware of your Bluetooth Smart device over-the-air (OTA). It is compatible with Nordic Semiconductor nRF51822 or nRF51422 devices with S110 SoftDevice and DFU bootloader enabled. With SoftDevice s110 7.0.0+, the SoftDevice itself and/or a bootloader may also be updated. \n\nFor more information about the DFU, see the About DFU section in Settings.
File browser application has not been found on your device. Would you like to download one?
Example HEX files were copied to /sdcard/Nordic Semiconductor.
New example HEX files were copied to /sdcard/Nordic Semiconductor.

Do you want to select the Init packet file?\n The Init packet file (*.dat) should contain the device type and revision, application version, list of supported Soft Devices and the firmware CRC in binary format or, with old versions of the DFU bootloader, only the CRC (CRC-CCITT-16). With the new version of the bootloader the extended Init packet is required.

A file browser application must be installed on the device before selecting the file. 

There are number of applications available on Google Play store, e.g. Total Commander or File Manager, that allow you to pick a file from internal memory of the device. To upload a file from the Internet you may use f.e. Drive or Dropbox application. 

You will be asked to select an application if more than one is installed. A single application will be launched automatically. 

Since Android KitKat you may use the preinstalled document picker application. Ensure Display advanced devices option is enabled in settings to use the Internal storage. 

Sample applications were copied to Nordic Semiconductor folder in the internal storage.
DFU script files were copied to /sdcard/Nordic Semiconductor.
DFU documentation on Nordic\'s Developer Zone

During a DFU operation a lot of data packets are being sent to the target. The onCharacteristicWrite(...) callback in Android API is invoked when the data has been written to the outgoing queue, not when physically sent. Packet receipt notifications were introduced to prevent from overflowing the queue. Depending on the device model, disabling the notifications or setting the value to “high” (> ~300) may make the DFU process freeze at some point.
Are you sure to cancel upload?

Starting from nRF Toolbox v1.12 the new Distribution packet (ZIP) is the recommended method for distributing firmware upgrades. You can create the ZIP file using the nrf utility tool, which is part of Master Control Panel 3.8.0+. For more detailed information, see the DFU documentation. 

Backward compatibility 
The nRF Toolbox also supports all old file formats: HEX and BIN files, separate DAT files and ZIP files without a manifest file but with a fixed naming convention:
正在测量心率...\n(持续一分钟)
正在测量血压...\n(持续一分钟)

B5是一款有屏，可记录日常运动及睡眠质量的超薄铝质表。当通过蓝牙4.0连接到智能手机时，设备将显示来电、短信、邮件、日历事件及社交活动提醒.
帐号不存在，请重新输入
需先下载facebook 应用程序.
你的网络已经断开，上传数据失败
您的账户名不存在，请重新输入
安卓4.3及以上版本，本机版本为：
请保证电量在20%以上再进行升级操作
请阅读并确认用户协议
超过规定字符无法再输入(汉字\n不超过7个，英文字符不超过23个)
一旦到时提醒时间，设备会轻微震动并显示对应提示图标.
本次操作会删除所有运动数据并恢复到出厂设置
此操作将删除您所有的运动数据并\n恢复Lefit Plus到原来的设置
数据同步中，请稍后再试
时间重复,添加失败,请重试!
操作成功 ! 请检查你的邮箱
在计算机上下载安装B5软件
请按如下操作更新软件
固件升级要求\n继续使用B5, 你需将固件升级至最新版本，V
运动数据上传失败!,网络稳定时，数据将自动上传
